Text: Risk Management PoliciesRod EOTT Risk Management Policy is attached David Benepe Manager Risk Management and Position Controls EOTT Energy Inc Forwarded by David BenepeHoustonEott on AM Lawrence Clayton AM To David ott cc Subject Risk Management Policies have you got this need any input from me Forwarded by Lawrence ClaytonHoustonEott on AM Rod nronXgate PM To Jim nronxgate Keith Harris Email nronXgate Lawrence ott cc Subject Risk Management Policies To the extent you have a policy concerning risk management would you please forward me a copy so that I can get your input into some changes that the Enron Board will be asked to make to the Enron policy I will copy you on what I get from them Rod Hayslett EB
